snippet: Senior Republican officials say the conservatives pushing the shutdown are undermining the party and its efforts to modernize, and helping President Obama just as his standing with the public has begun to slide.
abstract: Hard-line stance of Republican House members on the government shutdown is generating increasing anger among senior GOP officials, who say small bloc of conservatives is undermining party and helping Pres Obama just as American people appear to be losing confidence in him; Republicans press leaders of effort to block funding for health care law to explain where their strategy is ultimately leading.
lead_paragraph: Senior Republican officials say the conservatives pushing the shutdown are undermining the party and its efforts to modernize, and helping President Obama just as his standing with the public has begun to slide.

headline.main: G.O.P. Elders See Liabilities in Shutdown
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Elders See Liabilities In Shutdown

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
